ok so today at my school they had a guest speaker..two in fact.... and i got to the auditiorium and i was like yeah yeah whatever its all gonna be bullshit but then the men started to talk...they spoke about the hardships they had both had  had to go through to get where they were now.. and it hit me..



what the fuck am i doing with my life?


and as they drawled on i started to relize that this whole of deal of being sad about something i had no say in...it wasnt worthwhile...i was wasting my time, wasting my life...and its an epiphany...i just felt the self pity and the anger melt away....i am healthy and so is my family


we may have our problems but i have people who love me, i have friends who like me, i am smarter than like half the kids my age but im letting all my talent go to waste

and i figured out that i dont have time to waste on regretting things.,...on never saying what i meant to..of letting thank you's and i love you's go bye..because i am already through with 15 years of my life and what do i have to show for it? i am going to make a difference..in my life....in the world


i am not going to go unnoticed anymore


i feel so ..........settled like...i know that my life is hard..it is hard for me to deal with people and i do have a tendency to get anxious and depressed but i am not going to let that dark side rule me anymore


i am going to win over my bad habits i will succeed and if i get upset..i am not going to freeze and wait for somebody to rescue me..

i can do this                    i can live my life              i can succeed


and it feels great..knowing that i have the power to change my life...maybe not immeditely but i can do it

i can do it


to all my friedns who have been there for me when i have been so upset and moody


i love you


and to all the boys that made me feel so insecure and ugly

i dont care anymore i really honestly dont i am going to stop looking for somebody to complete me..i am ok as i am...i can do this without somebody to lean on i have a bunch of great friends...i am NOT going to look anymore..if somebody happens along then so be it..if not then i will still be ok

i can do this

i CAN

the rain is falling

running down my back and 
thighs
I am 
enamored
of this sweet perfection
drops on my tongue
washing away tears
blood
and im alone
middle stage
front and center
the concrete as my
dancing ground

some undressing me
feel hatred raw and blazing

will hold me
tightly
sensuously
lovingly
and I am
warm?
not really but alright
but I feel it leaving
coming softer now
and the pitter patter of my

fades to rainbows
want to touch them?
go on and try
don't worry they wont taunt you for long
soon they 
(like everything else)
will
fade 
to
black
again

The time is now...
Cause this might be your last chance"

1. Write the name of a person of the opposite 

2. Which is your favorite color out of red,
black, blue, green, yellow? 

3. Your first initial?

4. Your month of birth?

5. Which color do you like more, black or white?

6. Name of a person of the same sex as yours.

7. Your favorite number?

8. Do you like California or Florida more?

9. Do you like the lake or the ocean more?

10. Write down a wish. (A realistic one).


WHEN YOU'RE DONE, SCROLL DOWN
(DON'T
CHEAT)

.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.

THE ANSWERS


1. You are completely in love with this person.

2. If you choose:

Red - You are alert and your life is full of
love.

Black - You are conservative and aggressive.

Green - Your soul is relaxed and you are laid
back.

Blue - You are spontaneous and love kisses
and
affection from the ones you love.

Yellow- you are a very happy person and give
good advice to those who are down.


3. If your initial is:

A-K You have a lot of love and friendships in
your life.

L-R You try to enjoy your life to the maximum
and your love life is
soon to blossom.

S-Z You like to help others and your future love
life looks very good.


4. If you were born in:

Jan-Mar: The year will go very well for you and
you will discover that you fall in love with
someone totally unexpected.

April-June: You will have a strong love
relationship that will not last long but the
memories will last forever.

July-Sep: You will have a great year and will
experience a major life changing experience for
the good.

Oct-Dec: Your love life will not be too great,
but eventually you will find your soul mate.

5. If you chose...

Black: Your life will take on a different
direction, it will seem hard at the time but
will be the best thing for you, and you will
be glad for the change.

White: You will have a friend who completely
confides in you and would do anything for you,
but you may not realize it.


6. This person is your best friend.

7. This is how many close friends you have in
your lifetime.

8. If you chose:
California: You like adventure.
Florida: You are a laid back person.

9. If you chose:

Lake: You are loyal to your friends and to your
love. And you are very reserved.

Ocean: You are spontaneous and like to please
people.

10. This wish will come true only if you RE-
POST THIS BULLETIN in one hour., and it will come
true before your next birthday

i stand there
strong and silent
(weak and sobbing)
set up again and again
(let down and each time i die a little more)
never ending parade of blubbering idiots 
(genius surrounds me)
and the montomy of each day
(hectic and unpredictable)
turns me all around
spins me upside down
(standing straight and tall)
eleven, twelve, one
count down hours until daylight
(until death, until the end of it all)
reading others thoughts
(never knowing what they say of me)
and stealing words
( pages burned and blackened)
but mine never fit












and each day



i die a little more




and every love



scrapes away at my


wounds



openes them again



shut down now


say my goodbyes


and tell them it's all a lie


console those who wont remeber me when im gone



and of course im kidding



sparkles and under





blood

staring at my feet
cheeks turning red
searching for the words 
feeling nervous
Trying to be so perfect
Cause I know you're worth it
If I could say what I want to say
Be with you every night
Am I squeezing you too tight?
These words keep slipping away
I stutter 
I stumble 
like I've got nothing 
to say
Guess I'm wishing my life away
These things I'll never say
